item.description:
# Portal APIs

Here are all portal APIs. Are tested the CRUD processes when available as well as exceptions that might occure, to assure that everything works as intended.

### Typical execution

The typical test consists of:
1. A successful createOrUpdate (POST) - remplace with create when createOrUpdate is unavailable
2. A successful read (GET) - check if entity created in point 1 is retreived
3. A failed Create (POST) - due to entity already created
4. A failed update (PUT) - due to a non existant entity
5. A succesfull update (PUT) - update entity created in point 1
6. A succesfull createOrUpdate (POST) - update entity created in point 1 - skip this if createOrUpdate is unavailable
7. A successful read (GET) - check if updated entity from point 5 and 6 have been correctly updated
8. Any extra failed tests such as MISSING_PARAMETER or INVALID_PARAMETER

Please ensure that tests are correctly asserted in the Tests tab.

## Table of portal entities

| Entity                    | Create | Read | Update | Delete | Other           | Exception Handling |
|---------------------------|--------|------|--------|--------|-----------------|--------------------|
| Access                    |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Account Hierarchy         | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Account Operation         | TODO   | TODO | TODO   | TODO   |                 | TODO               |
| Accouting Code            | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 |                    |
| Addressbook               |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Audit                     |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Billing Account           | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Billing Run               | OK     | NA   | NA     | NA     | Validate/Cancel | OK                 |
| Billing Cycle             | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Business Account          |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Business Offer Model      |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Business Product Model    |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Business Service Model    |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Calendar                  | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Catalog                   |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Channel                   | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Channel and Segments      |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Charge Template           |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Chart                     |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Communication             |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Configuration             |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Contact                   |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Counter Template          |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| CountryIso                | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Country                   |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |
| Credit Category           | OK     | OK   | OK     | OK     |                 | OK                 |
| Currency                  |        |      |        |        |                 |                    |

body.raw:
{
    "code": "{{entityPrefix}}_{{index}}_FilterRT",
    "description": "Rated transactions for invoicing test",
    "shared": "false",
    "inputXml": "<filter>
    <primarySelector>
    <targetEntity>org.meveo.model.billing.RatedTransaction</targetEntity>
    <alias>r</alias>
    <displayFields>
      <field>code</field>
      <field>description</field>
      <field>usageDate</field>
    </displayFields>
    <exportFields/>
    <ignoreIfNotFoundForeignKeys/>
  </primarySelector>
  <secondarySelectors/>
  <disabled>false</disabled>
  <appendGeneratedCode>false</appendGeneratedCode>
  <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition">
    <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType>
    <filterConditions>
        <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition">
            <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType>
            <filterConditions>
                  <primitiveFilterCondition>
                    <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                    <fieldName>usageDate</fieldName>
                    <operator><![CDATA[<=]]></operator>
                    <operand>date:01/05/2016</operand>
                  </primitiveFilterCondition>
            </filterConditions>
        </filterCondition>
        <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition">
            <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType>
            <filterConditions>
                <primitiveFilterCondition>
                    <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                    <fieldName>code</fieldName>
                    <operator>=</operator>
                    <operand>{{baseEntityPrefix}}_REC1</operand>
                  </primitiveFilterCondition>
            </filterConditions>
        </filterCondition>
    </filterConditions>
  </filterCondition>
</filter>"
  }
